actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to exempt range sheep industry mobile housing from regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers.

summary.text: Provides that the Secretary of Labor shall not apply the Federal regulations governing permanent housing for agricultural workers to the nonwintering, mobile housing facilities (commonly known as "camp wagons") used in the range sheep industry.

titles.title: A bill to exempt range sheep industry mobile housing from regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers.
